name: Sclera (itch)
description:
Lady Dandelion's home has been invaded by some mischievous eyeballs. Let's defeat them!

SPACE - To unleash a magic beam

LEFT AND RIGHT ARROW KEYS - To walk

UP ARROW KEY - To enter doors

---------------------------------------------------------------

A game by Aevi.

Many thanks to bangcorrupt, inspectorj, poptonic and tolerabledruid6 on Freesound.org for the wonderful music and sound.

---------------------------------------------------------------

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Applied Sciences Europe. Supervised by: Prof. Csongor Baranyai "Game-A-Week"  (WinterSemester 2020/21)
